Lv 2. 이진 변환 반복하기

문제

풀이

function binaryConversion(n) {
  let binary = "";
  while (n > 0) {
    binary = (n % 2) + binary;
    n = Math.floor(n / 2);
  }
  return binary;
}

function solution(s) {
  let transformationCount = 0;
  let removedZerosCount = 0;

  while (s !== "1") {
    removedZerosCount += (s.match(/0/g) || []).length;
    s = s.replace(/0/g, "");
    s = binaryConversion(s.length);
    transformationCount++;
  }

  return [transformationCount, removedZerosCount];
}
